marklogic.body: This is completely topic, but i was wondering if anyone has heard Steven Powells reaction to his son and his two grandsons deaths...has a tear been shed, a frown emitted, a word of sorrow, a sad song composed perhaps?...no?...no i didnt think so...three of your blood lines dead and gone in a heinous Act of selfishness by your own flesh and blood, and you got nary the slightest comment either way...that goes beyond Cold-hearted, that flies directly into psychopathic~
